name: 光之迷城 / Dawn of the Lost Castle
name_original: 光之迷城 / Dawn of the Lost Castle
description:
"Dawn of the Lost Castle" is an adventure puzzle, trying to solve all the mysteries in the castle to understand the story of the castle.


Preface:

Jess followed an old treasure map through the dangerous primeval forest to the outside of the castle. But all around the castle were ruins, and though they looked like other abandoned places, there was always something old and old that gave off an unmistakable smell...




Main features:

Different weapons have different USES;

Light, physics, motion, puzzles, mazes, Numbers, and more.

Single player game
